name: Rabylinth
description:
Move red box to the blue area, and do NOT make red box hit the wall. SIMPLE!

WASD/arrow keys to move red box. key to reload. to quit the game completely.

Feel free to download and all the critiques and comments will be welcomed! I'm all ears! I need to know what to fix or wrong and what good features or ideas will suit into this game.

This is a prototype and I do want to make this to be up-marketed with high quality. I need your help!

Tracks:

How to play, Drowsy Night : Airlex(Me)

Your choice : Alex Menco
